title: Lag spikes during game
body: I have noticed for a while now that during any matches, I will have a lag spike happening just before any big fights or every 30 seconds or so. I on purpose have my settings set low and nothing. I recently just changed my router so that should of fixed it but it hasn't. What do i do :(

replies.body: i have the same probleme ,  it had started since last month  idk why ive never had that problem before  , i tried to repair my clint but did not work

If that's happening this often and in every match, you might not be getting a solid connection with our servers which is causing a few stutters. Check out your network settings using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but do pay close attention to the steps on port forwarding and how to configure and flush your DNS.
